transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Yeah, ma'am, good afternoon. Abdul bol raha hu ma'am IndiaMART se, Vium ka manager.
Customer: Kaisi hai ma'am?
Executive: Sir boliye. Mai thik hu, aap kaise hai?
Customer: Ji ma'am aapne call kiya tha IndiaMART wo customer care se.
Customer: Bilkul, Sudhir Vium phone nahi pick kar raha hai, na response kar raha hai. Maine usko message drop kiya, wo kuch bataya nahi.
Executive: Ma'am wo Vium ke wo lead [inaudible].
Customer: Call back aaya tha uska?
Executive: Nahi, ek baar aaya tha but maine call back again kiya, do baar maine kiya wo busy ja raha hai, usko koi response nahi mila. Kal ki baat hai ye, aaj ki baat nahi hai. That's why mujhe again usse call back karna pada.
Customer: Ha wo.
Executive: Ma'am wo medical leave pe hai kal se.
Customer: Isliye wo aapko response ya call bhi nahi kiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Thik hai, bas mai ha, mai yahi bolne ke liye call kar rahi thi ki sir dekho, inquiry bilkul bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Thik hai? Maine Vium se bola bhi tha ki mai after Diwali mai sirf upgrade karne ke liye bhi soch rahi hu. But jab agar mai dekhu last one month ki inquiry uske pehle ki inquiry aap dekhoge na buyleads toh aa hi nahi rahi hai. And Delhi ki inquiry aa rahi, Delhi pe toh hum kaam karna, humne usko restricted bhi kar rakha hai us area ko, fir bhi hume bas Delhi ki leads dikh rahi hai. Toh maine Vium se bola bhi tha ki hume Delhi ki leads toh chahiye hi nahi. Mujhe UP ki leads chahiye toh UP ki leads mujhe dikh hi nahi rahi hai kahi se bhi.
Customer: Ab but mujhe leads black ho rahe hai, mai kaam bhi nahi kar pa rahi hu us pe.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Ab mera lead manager bhi jaake check kar sakte ho ki kitni leads aa rahi, kaha se aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ha ma'am, mai aapka hi lead check kar raha hu.
Customer: Agar mujhe lead dikhegi hi nahi toh ha, mujhe lead dikhegi hi nahi toh mai pick kaha se karungi aap batao na fir.
Executive: Nahi, correct hai na ma'am, mai us pe ye nahi kar raha but mai abhi check kar raha hu na toh Delhi ki leads toh nahi dikh rahi hai humare yaha pe abhi aaj ke date me koi aisa ki Delhi ke buylead aayi hai. But aapko ye hai ki abhi jo inquiry aayi hai, ji.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Aap IndiaMART se abhi aap desktop pe ho ma'am?
Customer: Nahi, bataiye, mai desktop pe nahi hu, bataiye aap.
Executive: Aap ek baar buylead open kijiye.
Customer: Mobile application se.
Executive: Sir maine check karke dekha hai, aap dekho na, aap batao na ki kya hai. Aap bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Mai dekh raha hu. Ma'am wahi toh mai dekh raha hu na ki jo aap bata rahi hai na ki aapko sirf buylead Delhi ki aa rahi hai, hai na ma'am? Delhi ki buylead aa rahi hai. Aur abhi mai jo jo jo jo UP se aayi hai wo ek do piece ki aayi hai. Maine bataya ki hum ek do piece me jisko lena hai wo retail me jaake shop se lega na. Wo Ghaziabad, Delhi aur Noida se kyun aayega?
Executive: Nahi, aaj ke date me jo buylead aayi hai wo aapne Fatehpur jo UP se aayi hai, us pe aapne purchase kiya hai? Aur do track hai.
Customer: Ha, ek minute, thik hai. Mai dekh raha hu.
Customer: Aise iske liye toh hum kaam hi nahi karte hai.
Executive: Toh ye aapka nahi hai, ye irrelevant hai. Iske alawa aur bhi buylead aapko dikh rahi hogi, wo dekhiye usme se koi relevant hai aapke?
Customer: Dekh rahi hai.
Executive: 20 wheel trust seal diye hai, 10-20 liter, do piece ki dikh rahi hai, do piece jisko lena hoga wo local se jaake shop se le lega. Wo kyun nahi jitna ka product lene ko usse jyada toh uska transport lag jayega yaha se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur dekhiye ma'am, aapko aaj ke date me koi buylead dikh rahi hai jo aapke relevant hai?
Customer: Kuch ek bhi nahi dikh rahi hai na, jo ek piece, do piece, ek piece, paanch piece, ab 15 liter ka aap aap khud hi socho na ki kisi ko 15 liter, paanch piece lena hoga, jiski pricing 60-60 rupaye, 70-70 rupaye hai, 70 wo do 250 ka product se Ghaziabad se purchase karega, usse jyada toh uska transport lag jayega 1000, 2000, 3000 ka. Jitne ka product nahi usse jyada toh uska transport rahega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ab aap khud hi dekho na, aap mujhe mat dikhao, aap pehle khud pura analysis kar lo then aap mujhe batao.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo sahi hai ma'am, abhi aa jayegi aapke paas inquiry, thoda wait kijiye.
Customer: Sir abhi aap 20 din pakde se toh wait hi kar rahe hai, nahi aa rahi hai, tabhi toh maine call kiya hai. Last time Vium ne bola, unhone jabardasti meri query band kar di. Lekin fir bhi ma'am aa jayegi, aa jayegi, fir bhi maine query close kar diya, fir bhi nahi aaya. Last three months se yahi ho raha hai, aap batao na mai kya karu?
Executive: Ha ma'am aa jayegi. Mai aapko jo hai na kuch correction puch raha hu, aap mujhe bata dijiye, mai usko mark kar deta hu. Jaise aapka pehla product hai blue plastic pallet, wo material hai nahi?
Customer: Wo hamara matlab ye ye mera high priority nahi hai. Hamara jo hai wo dustbin ka hai. Aap pallets usko hata bhi sakte ho, koi dikkat nahi hai. Jo hamara hai 10 liter se leke 1100 liter tak hamara main jo hamara product hai wo ye hai, major product hamara ye hai, dustbin hai na ki pallets. Aap isko ha.
Executive: Sir dustbin hai?
Customer: Aur ye sab jo aapne dala hua hai, PP 300 top bench, bench ye sab pe nahi hai aapke?
Executive: Nahi, nahi.
Customer: Okay, ye aapka ye nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi. Kisi ne MS high mast solar street pole nahi. Ha ye pole pole ka hai, pole aur dustbins. But ab ab jo high priority pe hai hamara major major hai jo hamara dustbin hi hai.
Customer: Thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai. Ma'am mai isme ji, isme jo hai na jaise pole ka aapka hai na toh isme ek hi category markte hai. High mast lighting pole, ab isme jo hai na mujhe category bata dijiye ki solar mast lighting me aayega ye solar street pe light me light pole me aayega. Street light pole me aayega.
Customer: Ye light street light pole bhi hai, solar light pole bhi hai, sari cheeze hai iske andar.
Executive: Toh solar street light pole me mai mark kar du ma'am?
Customer: Aapke paas isse bhi related inquiry hai.
Executive: Solar mat karo, street light se kar do aap.
Customer: Light pole jo hota hai.
Executive: Ha, ha.
Customer: LED street light pole aayega, aur bhi street light pole aayega, round street light pole yahi aayega na?
Executive: Yes, yes, yes.
Executive: Thik hai, iska maine mark kar diya. Ye aapka jo so ye plastic tool storage bin, isme isme deal karti hai ma'am aap?
Customer: Kaunsa bola aapne?
Executive: Plastic tool storage bin.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Storage bin me deal nahi karte ma'am aap?
Customer: Tool storage.
Executive: Nahi, dustbin, dustbin me hum log deal karte hai. Maine bataya na mera hot product jo hai wo dustbin hai. Abhi yaha pe aapne product me dala hua hai isliye mai puch raha hu.
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Executive: Product me aapka dala hua hai. Mai ye chah raha hu na ki aapke catalog me jo bhi aapka product hai na mai sabko dal du jisme aap deal karti hai toh usse bhi aapke paas inquiry aaye. Ab jaise aapne dala blue plastic.
Customer: Nahi nahi mera hot product ab aap ek kaam karo bas mera hot product dustbin ka hai, dustbin pe aap jyada focus karo. Mujhe usi ke usi se bhi relevant hi inquiry chahiye. Aur pole ka bhi aaye toh mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai. Lekin major jo hai maine bataya mera dustbin ka hi hai.
Executive: Dustbin hi hai. Toh dustbin me jaise ye hai ma'am, paper bin.
Customer: Dustbin me dustbin se isme aapko dikh rahe hai na sare aap kar do.
Executive: Okay. Stainless steel dustbin me bhi aap deal karte hai ma'am?
Customer: Ha, stainless steel dustbin, SS garbage bin.
Executive: Hmm. Thik hai, mai isko dal deta hu.
Executive: Ye aapka jo supreme wheel garbage bin 240 liter, ye aayega ma'am garbage bin me aayega, garbage container me aayega, plastic dustbin me aayega ya mini double dustbin me aayega?
Customer: Plastic dustbin me aayega. Plastic dustbin me aayega.
Executive: Thik hai, isko mai dal deta hu mai.
Executive: Industrial plastic pallet, isme nahi deal karte ma'am aap? Ye aapka product hai?
Customer: Plastic.
Executive: Plastic dustbin.
Customer: Ha, plastic dustbin.
Executive: Ye aayega plastic waste bin me aayega, wheel dustbin me aayega?
Customer: Wheel dustbin me dal do aap isko.
Executive: Dal diya.
Executive: 20 liter plastic dustbin, ye kis me aayega ma'am? Plastic waste bin me aayega, wooden dustbin me aayega, plastic bin me aayega ya dustbin me aayega ma'am?
Customer: Dustbin me.
Customer: Sare category dustbin me aap dal do, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai. Bas do minute ruk jayiye ma'am, isme jo hai na mai second category mark kar deta hu. Ek aapka swing lead dustbin 20 liter, ye kis me aayega ma'am? Plastic dustbin me aayega, swing dustbin me aayega, stainless steel me aayega ya wheel dustbin me aayega?
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Ye aapka hai swing swing lead swing lead dustbin.
Customer: Ha, toh swing swing dustbin me dal do aap.
Executive: Swing dustbin me aayega na?
Executive: Ah, stainless steel pole mounted dustbin, ye kis me aayega ma'am?
Customer: Kya category thi aap bataiye?
Executive: Ye ye stainless steel pole mounted deal hai. Mounted deal. Hmm. Mounted dustbin.
Customer: Ha sir. Thik hai, ye toh pole hai na, pole pole ki alag category hogi, dustbin ki category me toh aayega hi nahi.
Executive: Ye nahi nahi nahi yaha pe ye likha hua hai. Aapka jo product hai na stainless steel pole mounted dustbin.
Customer: Accha ha ye SS pole SS dustbin me aayega. Stainless steel stainless steel me aayega ya pedal bin me aayega, garbage bin kis me aayega ma'am?
Executive: Nahi, SS me aayega, stainless steel me aayega.
Executive: Stainless steel. Thik hai, thoda mai correction kar deta hu.
Executive: Ye aapka hai ma'am open top stainless. Ek second, mai thoda open kar leta hu.
Executive: Ah, ye hai open top stainless steel. Hello?
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Paper bin, ye kis me aayega? Category for office capacity.
Executive: Open top stainless steel.
Customer: Ha sir, isme SS dustbin me aa jayega ye.
Executive: Stainless steel dustbin me aa jayega.
Executive: Mark kar deta hu ma'am.
Executive: Line pe hi baki hai thik hai. Ye five liter me aayega na aapka?
Customer: Ha, five se start hota hai, five, 10, 15, 20 alag alag.
Executive: Five, 10 sab koi dal do.
Customer: Five, 10, 15, 20.
Executive: Ye toh aapka immediate hai. Thik hai, stainless steel me aayega na? Steel dustbin me bhi aayega ye?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Steel dustbin, dustbin basket bucket stainless product.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Mark kar diya. Ek hai aapka plastic dustbin, ye kis me kis me aayega ma'am? Plastic dustbin me aayega, plastic waste bin me aayega, dustbin me aayega ya wheel dustbin me aayega, bio medical waste bin me aayega? Kis me aayega ma'am?
Customer: Nahi, dustbin me.
Executive: Dustbin. Mark kar diya ma'am.
Executive: Ye aapka already mark hai ma'am. Stainless steel me kar deta hu mai isko.
Executive: Bas thoda sa time aur de dijiye ma'am. 10 liter plastic dustbin, ye kis me aayega ma'am? Plastic dustbin stand me aayega, dustbin me aayega?
Customer: Sir dekho, sara ye dustbin ke jo main category hai hamara dustbin hi rahega. Uske andar sare sub category hai, thik hai? Aur usi ko jo aapke keywords wo jo dikh raha hai category na wo sub category hai aur main category jo ek hi hai wo dustbin hai. Dustbin ke andar sare aa gaye. Aur do do dusra dusra category jo aata hai na suniye meri baat. Aap dustbin aur SS stainless steel dustbin do type ke hote hai, thik hai? SS wale jo hote hai jo steel ke aate hai aur plastic wale hote hai.
Customer: Ke hote hai, thik hai? Jisme alag alag liters hote hai. Agar aap bade me jaate ho toh wheel me wheel milta hai, agar chhote me jaate ho toh swing aata hai usme toh matlab open aata hai, uske baad usme matlab different different type ke top open aata hai aise karke aate hai. Toh main category hamara dustbin hi rahega, plastic dustbin rahega, thik hai? Ye sari cheeze rehti hai. Uske andar aap alag alag category dal do jo bhi aapko dalna hai.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am, mujhe mai update kar deta hu aapko. Thik hai ma'am, ye do teen din me aapki inquiry ma'am ho jayegi.
Customer: Thik hai, dekhti hu mai dekhti hu do teen din me.
Executive: Thik hai ma'am, toh ye increase ho jayega ma'am, koi issue nahi, maine mark kar diya hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- No inquiries are being received.

- Only Delhi leads are visible.

- Wants UP leads, but not visible.

- Leads are blocked, unable to work.



Resolution:

- Executive is checking the lead details.

- Executive is updating product categories.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer.

- Inquiry will increase in 2-3 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, dustbin, stainless steel, plastic
